headline: GTA Online
subtitle: THE STRAIGHT AND NARROW
content:
When it comes to spiraling an out of control super car through massive tubes in the sky, you consider yourself a virtuoso. But sometimes, you yearn for the simple days: just you, the road, and the ride.

Pay homage to old school skills with the Race Series, a greatest hits list ranging from old classics to brand new tracks. Time to floor that pedal, take on the most skillful drivers out there, and show them all how real racers win: good, and pure, and true.
